title: Mathematics Content Translation Project via Spanish Subtitling and Audio Narration Production

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced Spanish proficiency (B2+), foundational knowledge of mathematics curriculum, and practical experience in translation work
context.additional_context: Conducting practical projects to translate math education content (subtitles/audio explanations) into Spanish. Hands-on classes using digital devices (tablets, laptops)

learning_goals: Implement Spanish subtitles for a 10-minute math education video with ≥90% accuracy considering cultural context.
Achieve ≥85% fidelity in conveying original meaning when producing voice-over explanations for mathematical concepts.
Write peer and self-evaluation reports for team project deliverables.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
